name: Shoot 'Em Up (VortexInCortex)
description:
Take the game in hand and fight for your life to get as much score as you can !

--------------------------------------------------

This is my first game so if you could critize it as much as you can in the comments! Just please post subjective comments 

(E.g.: The grenade drop sound is very frustrating and at the same time is not loud enough!)

--------------------------------------------------

-INeedFeedback 

(I have an unofficial studio name, because I'm alone.)
